name: autotabsorganizer
description: 1. Run npm run build. 2. Open Firefox and go to about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox and Load Temporary Add-on -> select dist/manifest.json. 4. Click the extension popup and press "Organize Tabs".

scripts.build: tsc && rsync -a --include='*/' --include='*.html' --include='*.css' --include='*.svg' --exclude='*' src/ dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp LICENSE dist/LICENSE
